successes.title: Hub+ for USB-C: Get your MacBook ports back.
successes.description: Our Kickstarter campaign has ended. If you are interested in placing a pre-order on nonda.co for estimated delivery in October, please click on “Pre-order on NONDA"

Pledges.description: HUB+ FAN: Thanks! You're awesome and to prove it, we'll add you to our Awesome List on our website. You'll also be the first to hear about our newest products and get invited to be part of our-beta tester family.

HUB+ EARLY BIRD: Congratulations! You’ll get one Hub+ and one bonus adapter. 
Want more units? For every additional $79, we'll send you another Hub+ and bonus adapter.
Choose from three colors when the stretch goal is met.
Regular retail price will be $114.

HUB+ SPECIAL: Get ready to get your ports back! You’ll get one Hub+. 
For every additional $79, we'll send you another Hub+.
Choose from three colors when the stretch goal is met.
Regular retail price will be $99.

HUB+ BACKER BONUS: Due to popular demand, we have extended our mini adapter offer. You’ll get one Hub+ and one adapter (second batch shipping).
For every additional $86, we’ll send you another Hub+ and adapter. 
Choose from three colors when the stretch goal is met.
Regular retail price will be $114.

HUB+ BACKER DEAL: Due to popular demand, we're making HDMI possible. You’ll get one Hub+, one mini adapter, and one HDMI adapter (second batch shipping). 
For every additional $93, we’ll send you another Hub+, mini adapter, and HDMI adapter.
Choose from three colors when the stretch goal is met. 
Regular retail price will be $129.

HUB+ PACK: Aren’t you business savvy! You’ll receive ten Hub+ and ten bonus adapters. We'll also write you a special thank you note, sent with a lot of love. 
For every additional $699, we'll send you another ten pack. 
Choose from three colors when the stretch goal is met.
Regular retail price will be $1140.

HUB+ STYLE: Ka’ching! You’ve got ports and bling! You’ll get one 24k gold-plated Hub+ and one gold-plated bonus adapter laser etched with your name or message.
For every additional $3,999, we'll send you another gold Hub+ and adapter.
Regular retail price: Priceless
